jasima.core.random.continuous

类 DblNormal

  • java.lang.Object
    • jasima.core.random.continuous.DblStream
      • jasima.core.random.continuous.DblNormal
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DblNormal
extends DblStream
    Creates a number stream with values following a Normal distribution.
    作者:
    Torsten Hildebrandt
    另请参阅:
    Normal distribution (Wikipedia), Normal distribution (MathWorld), 序列化表格

        public double getMean()

      • setMean

        public void setMean(double mean)

        参数:

      • getStdev

        public double getStdev()

      • setStdev

        public void setStdev(double stdev)
              throws org.apache.commons.math3.exception.NotPositiveException
        Sets the standard deviation of this normally distributed number stream. This defaults to 1.0.
        参数:
        stdev - The standard deviation.
        抛出:
        org.apache.commons.math3.exception.NotPositiveException - Raised if stdev was negative.
